summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Economic Development Committee of the Dallas City Council will convene on February 3, 2025, at 1:00 PM in the Council Chambers, City Hall. The meeting will be accessible both in-person and via videoconference, aiming to discuss various economic development initiatives and upcoming agenda items.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the minutes from the January 6, 2025, meeting.
2. Briefing on upcoming agenda items scheduled for February 12 and February 26, 2025, including:
   - FY 2023-2024 Tax Increment Financing (TIF) District Annual Reports.
   - New Markets Tax Credit Transaction for St. Philipâ€™s School and Community Center.
   - Amendment of Chapter 380 economic development agreements related to the 1708 MLK Redevelopment Project.
   - Construction Services Contract for the Trinity Strand Trail Hi-Line Span Project.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include the review of economic development incentives awarded through administrative action and an update on the Small Business Microgrants Program. These items are crucial for ongoing economic initiatives and community support.

**Action Items**:  
The committee will seek approval for the meeting minutes and discuss the outlined upcoming agenda items, with decisions expected on the proposed agreements and contracts. Additionally, an executive session may be called to discuss legal and property matters related to these agenda items.
